rows: Upload an image from your image library or via a URL. This enables theAuto widthparameter.
Whether to set image width automatically or specify a custom value. For this example, disable the toggle and drag theWidthslider to 10 percent.
How to align the image. For this example, selectLeft.
html:
Parameter

Parameter value

Choose image

Upload an image from your image library or via a URL. This enables the Auto width parameter.

Auto width

Whether to set image width automatically or specify a custom value. For this example, disable the toggle and drag the Width slider to 10 percent.

Align

How to align the image. For this example, select Left.
